TEXT.TITLE: MEDICAL PROPERTIES <MPP> SETS MONTHLY DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: The board of Medical Properties Inc said it has declared an initial monthly cash dividend of 11-1/2 cts a share and has adopted a monthly dividend policy. The initial dividend will be payable April 10 to shareholders of record March 31. Reuter
